          <title>
            <string language="en">Evaporation of a liquid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung einer Flüssigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaporation d'un liquide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evaporação de um líquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Evaporazione di un liquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάτμιση ενός υγρού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaporación de un líquido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the evaporation of a liquid into gas when the particles in the liquid gains enough energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phase transition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Verdampfung einer 
Flüssigkeit in Gas wenn die Partikel in den flüssigen Gewinnen 
genügend Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre l'évaporation d'un 
liquide dans le gaz quand les particules dans les gains liquides assez
d'énergie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstrar a evaporação de um 
líquido no gás quando as partículas nos ganhos líquidos bastante 
energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra l'evaporazione di un 
liquido in gas quando le particelle nei guadagni liquidi abbastanza 
energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει την εξάτμιση ενός 
υγρού αέριο όταν τα μόρια στα υγρά κέρδη αρκετή ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra la evaporación de un 
líquido en el gas cuando las partículas en los aumentos líquidos 
bastante energía.</string>
          </description>
